# Ananta Drishti Yoga

> A traditional yoga school in Rishikesh, India, offering Yoga Alliance certified Teacher Training Courses (200, 300 Hour) and immersive retreats. We blend ancient scripture, Bhakti (devotion), and scientific alignment to offer a "Journey to the Self".
